ModMetaData.name: LTS Ammo - Turrets use Ammo
ModMetaData.author: bblkepling
ModMetaData.description:
Patches turrets to use ammo from LTS Ammunition.
Supported Mods:
Vanilla -Mini Turret Industrial Ammo -Autocannon Industrial Ammo
Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security -Military Turret Industrial Ammo -Sentry Gun Industrial Ammo -HMG Complex Industrial Ammo -Autocannon Double Industrial Ammo -Charge Turret Spacer Ammo -Charge Complex Spacer Ammo
Eccentric Tech - Foxy's Armory -P17SG Spacer Ammo -L32MG Spacer Ammo -M3ACGL Spacer Ammo
Censored Armory -MG 42 Industrial Ammo
Kaiser Armory -MG 08 Industrial Ammo
